Author: danielha
Content: Do it! But I noticed the same thing. The network of YC companies seems tight. The YC front page is using HeySan for the slide show and I wouldn't be surprised if some of the pics were edited with Snipshot.

Author: brezina
Content: I love how you used JamGlue to post the music track.  Y Combinator companies feed so well off each other.  I should remix the jamglue track and add some yc flava!
